name: Red Run (Aksakl1k)
description:
You are little red cube that escapes from black cubes. How far can you go? Collect golds and reach the end of level so you get higher points.

How to control:

Android: touch screen to go left or right. Boost option can be change in setting, it can be on left or right or can trigger if there is more than 2 touch.

Windows: A or D or Left Arrow or Right Arrow to go left or right. Left or right shift to boost.

This game made with only visual scripts that unity 2021 supports.
